properties.name: disk-mirror.config
properties.description: The adapter type to be used by diskMirror. Available options can be viewed through the top.lingyuzhao.diskMirror.core.DiskMirror class.

properties.name: disk-mirror.fs-default-fs
properties.description: The address of a third-party file system (e.g., HDFS) that the diskMirror adapter should connect to if required.

properties.name: disk-mirror.params
properties.description: Parameters used when concatenating URLs during diskMirror operations. The implementation varies across different adapters.

properties.name: disk-mirror.protocol-prefix
properties.description: The protocol prefix to use when constructing URLs in diskMirror.

properties.name: disk-mirror.res-key
properties.description: When returning operation results, diskMirror uses this configuration item as the name of the field containing the result status.

properties.name: disk-mirror.root-dir
properties.description: The root directory used by the diskMirror adapter during operations. This specified directory will be managed by diskMirror.

properties.name: disk-mirror.secure-key
properties.description: A security key is required for diskMirror operations. If the client's key differs from this value, an error is raised directly. This configuration item specifies a string-based key which will be calculated into an integer value using a specific algorithm. Clients must include this value in their requests.

properties.name: disk-mirror.space-max-size
properties.description: In diskMirror, you can configure individual space quotas for each user. Using this configuration item, you can set the default space quota for users in bytes.

properties.name: disk-mirror.user-disk-mirror-space-quota
properties.description: diskMirror divides space into multiple segments with usage limits. This configuration item is used to specify the space quota for each segment in bytes.
